remarks: Reversal of a finite product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Jan-2018.)
statement:
fprodshft.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
fprodshft.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
fprodshft.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
fprodshft.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fprodrev.5 $e |- ( j = ( K - k ) -> A = B ) $.
fprodrev $p |- ( ph -> prod_ j e. ( M ... N ) A = prod_ k e. ( ( K - N ) ... ( K - M ) ) B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B j $.
$d K j k $.
$d M j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d j k ph $.
